meaningMnemonic: Which of your <kanji>guts</kanji> is <kanji>blind</kanji>? Your <vocabulary>appendix</vocabulary>. That's why so many people have to get them out. It's in there blind, bumping around, messing things up.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
